short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Directly access all the available fonts on Google Fonts. Test, explore, compare and use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing LazyFonts, your ultimate tool for accessing and utilizing the entire collection of fonts available on Google Fonts. This extension offers a user-friendly interface packed with powerful features, enabling you to test, explore, and compare fonts effortlessly.
With this extension, you can easily browse through all Google Fonts, filter them based on various criteria such as style and weight, and fine-tune your selections to match your design needs. The intuitive filtering options allow you to quickly narrow down your choices, ensuring you find the perfect font for your project.
The extension also provides a convenient feature to get direct links for any font, making it simple to integrate your chosen fonts into your website. You can create a list of your favorite fonts for quick access and keep track of the ones you love.
Additionally, this extension allows you to instantly identify the font family used in any HTML element on a web pages, streamlining your design process. Whether you're a web designer, developer, or typographer, this tool enhances your workflow by providing all the fonts and features you need in one place. Elevate your web design projects with our comprehensive and easy-to-use Google Fonts.

This extension includes the open-source Mellowtel library. If you opt-in this library will let you share your unused internet with trusted AI labs & startups who use it to train their models.
As the developer of this extension, I get a small share of the revenue. It helps maintain this extension free and available.
Mellowtel shares your bandwidth only. Security and privacy are 100% guaranteed, and the library is open source for everyone to see. It doesn't collect, share, or sell personal information (not even anonymized data). You can opt-in or opt-out of the library whenever you want.
